value.title: StarCraft 2: MaxPax's SURPRISING Dark Templar Switch!
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of European StarCraft 2, played on the 25th of December 2023. This series between MaxPax and HeroMarine is a Protoss versus Terran that is the finals of the ESL Open Cup 207 Europe. value.title: StarCraft 2: MaxPax's TRIPLE STARGATE PHOENIX Rush vs Reynor! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 between MaxPax (Protoss) and Reynor (Zerg). This series features a macro game as well as a focus on a cheeky Stargate opener by MaxPax, where he tries to rush out as many Phoenixes as possible with a triple Stargate start.
